content: The power subsystem consists of a battery, power control, and an implicit power supply.
The safety subsystem detects faults that may harm the patient, signals an alarm or warning, and stop infusion or reduces infusion to a keep vein open rate depending on the fault(s) detected.
The fluid subsystem moves drug from the reservoir to the line to the patient.
The operation subsystem controls infusion, performs security operations, and operates the user interface.
